services.title: Primary Care Services
services.description: Comprehensive health assessments and preventive screenings to detect potential issues early and maintain optimal health

services.title: Specialized Health Screenings
services.description: Targeted diagnostic examinations focusing on early detection of specific diseases and conditions in high-risk populations

services.title: Reproductive and Family Health
services.description: Complete healthcare services supporting fertility, pregnancy, family planning decisions, and maternal-child wellness throughout all life stages
